ActFisheries Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Metal and Diamond Mining Effluent Regulations
PrecisRegulations amending the METAL AND DIAMOND MINING EFFLUENT REGULATIONS in order to authorize the deposit of tailings and waste rock generated by the Project to fish-frequented water bodies.
